oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Martha White - 1953-01-03 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Martha White sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from January 3, 1953. Hosted by Ernest Tubb with announcer Jud Collins. Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/623
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Moon Mullican; Crook Brothers; Maybelle Carter; Carter Sisters; Bill Monroe; Blue Grass Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ernest Tubb introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Ernest Tubb) -- All Broke Out With Love (June Carter) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Moon Mullican -- Pipeliner Blues (Moon Mullican) -- Martha White commercial (Jud Collins) -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Crook Brothers -- Black Mountain Rag (The Crook Brothers) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Maybelle Carter and the Carter Sisters -- Wildwood Flower (Maybelle Carter, The Carter Sisters) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Bill Monroe -- Tall Timber (Bill Monroe and his Blue Grass Boys) -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Martha White jingle -- Closing statement (Jud Collins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Collins, Jud; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Monroe, Bill, 1911-1996; Blue Grass Boys; Carter, Anita; Carter, Maybelle, 1909-1978; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Carter Sisters; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Atkins, Chet; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Crook Brothers
